dict.acceptation: 试图，努力；实验；审判；考验；
尝试，实验；[橄]触球，（因触球获得的）向球门踢球的权利；

sent.orig: A try statement may have more than one except clause, to specify handlers for different exceptions.
sent.trans: 一个try语句可能包含多个except子句，分别指定处理不同的异常。

sent.orig: Winners try and fail and try again – losers don't try!
sent.trans: 成功的球员尝试、失败、再尝试；失败者就是没有去尝试。

sent.orig: If at first you don't succeed, try, try, and try again.
sent.trans: 如果开始不成功，那就一试再试下去。

sent.orig: If you don't succeed at first, try, try, try again.
If at first you don't succeed try, try, try again is a familiar precept.
sent.trans: 如你最初不成功，再试试看''是一句教诲。
